attributes.action: Require all MPs to repay expenses received since the last election, resubmit their claims explaining how the expense fulfils the 'wholly, necessarily and exclusively' requirement.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs should be seen to feel some personal pain for the acknowledged disgraceful way some have abused the system.  Those few MPs who have so abused the system will not resubmit inappropriate claims whereas the majority who have not can be swiftly reimbursed.  Resubmitted expenses should be in the public domain and reviewed swiftly by an independent panel but it is likely MPs will 'self police' their revised submissions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
